title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
created_time: February 01, 2023, 08:48:19 AMLast edit: February 01, 2023, 09:01:52 AM by Marykeller
content: In few weeks time the presidential election go start and we go decide one peso wey deem fit to rule us for this upcoming presidential election wey d come so. we get tenths of candidates from different political parties wey the eye the presidential seat. But in all of those tenths of candidates na only 3 strong candidates wey we know, and na them the likely to win the election. Their name na Bola Tinubu(APC), Atiku Abubakar(PDP) and Peter Obi(LP)An infographic has been provided by Channels TV to help us know the campaign plans and promises of each of the 3 top presidential candidates for the election After reading the infographic manifesto of each of them in all sectors, who do you think will fulfill his campaign promises when given power? Link to post: https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=pfbid0aLspHruuqGY77LLX6AZ1gF6DVgwdTpUzBenv97kbJyrQ6HSYLieFRbTZXTCH7rkgl&id=100044332811138

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I personally do not believe in all these infographics or manifesto if you may like. We have been hearing of them and listening to manifestos long ago from different contenders in past electoral seasons and after election, when they get the power, they dump everything about the manifestos as they had told us earlier and start doing or playing to the power that be, the power that brought them to power and they pay obeisance to them all forgetting the masses that voted them in. I prefer past records than manifestos, if you have been there before or you have held a public office by virtue of electoral votes or appointment, you should have track records of your achievement then. This will tell us what you are capable of doing. These three front runners were once public office holders and their records should decide for them who Nigerians should vote come presidential election. Some of them are aged which I would not mention names and I think Nigerians now know what is best for them.I read in one of the dailies yesterday that one of the presidential aspirants from another party stepped down for one of the three front runners of the presidential aspirants. This is democracy taken too far and indirect way of vote buying and rigging of election ahead of time because he has already instructed his followers to do same thing. This same thing happened in the primaries of one of the major political party during their presidential primaries.

comments.body: Well, with what both of them have said so far, I know it is a compaign promises which doesn't start today, their manifesto is no longer impressing us why because many have said the same thing and does nothing aft getting into power and it has thought us a very big lesson, now we mainly looking into the health status, because it has come to a point that we will look into their health status very well to make sure he healthy and sound before electing into an office to avoid travelling from one country to another seeking for medical attention,so my own view is mainly in strongness,and energetic matter alot..so I go for The strongness.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Good manifesto from all of them,the problem be say no be today yansh dey back. We don hear story tire about promises and sweet mouth before election, so that make citizens vote for them but after election all those manifesto promises na wash. None of them go fit do all those things we dem say dem go do,all na just big talk.Na just say among all thieves one most get conscience,I go fit vote for only Peter Obi. Make God help us for this our election to overcome the power of the evil ones.

comments.body: We Don too see things to come deh believe in manifestos, politicians don too tell us lie,All this Politicians no dey trust worthy again, even if Dem get better pass records or not, I no dey trust them.We just need president wey dey healthy, president wey go fit tackle insecurities, tackle subsidy so that the fuel price go reduce and create employment for the youth.Though among the 3 aspirant, I prefer peter obi because atleast he is young, make the older two papa go rest abeg, Dem don old
